thing-type.label: MH-S412 MCO Touch Panel Switch
thing-type.description: MCO Touch Panel Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Touch Panel Switch can be used to control house-hold electrical appliances like lamp, motor, coffee machine, TV set etc.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtSet controller into INCLUSION mode. Follow instructions provided by controller manufacturer.</li&gt <li&gtPress and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession.<br /&gtNote: If inclusion is successful, all INDICATION LEDs on the panel will flash 4 times.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtSet controller into EXCLUSION mode. Follow instructions provided by controller manufacturer.</li&gt <li&gtPress and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession.<br /&gtNote: If the exclusion is successful, all INDICATION LEDs on the panel will flash 4 times. The exclusion will delete all association data.</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Switch state saved or not when power failure
parameter.description: Switch state saved or not when power failure<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 not saved，switch will be off when powered again</p&gt <p&gt0x01 saved，switch will keep the same state when powered again - DEFAULT</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameter.description: ALL ON/ALL OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 forbid ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF</p&gt <p&gt0x01 forbid ALL ON, allow ALL OFF</p&gt <p&gt0x02 allow ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF</p&gt <p&gt0xFF allow ALL ON, allow ALL OFF - DEFAULT</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: LED Backlit brightness level
parameter.description: LED Backlit brightness level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 LED disabled</p&gt <p&gt0x01~0x0A Min level-Max level</p&gt <p&gt&gt;0x0A same level as 0x0A - DEFAULT</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Key Mode
parameter.description: Key Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 single click to switch on/off status - DEFAULT</p&gt <p&gt0x01 Key default as off state. When it is turned on, then it will be turned off automatically after a time period , which can be set in item 0x06</p&gt <p&gt0x02 Key default as on state. When it is turned off, then it will be turned on automatically after a time period , which can be set in item 0x06</p&gt <p&gt0x03 hold &gt;3s then key is on, and off once released</p&gt <p&gt0X04 single click to switch on/off status + hold &gt;3s then key is on, and off once released</p&gt <p&gt**** This function works for corridor or stairwell situation. ****</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Key On duration
parameter.description: Key On duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 infinite - DEFAULT</p&gt <p&gt1~65535 unit "sec"</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Basic CC integration setting
parameter.description: Basic CC integration setting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 "Basic Set" received，key 1 responds; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; key 1 will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association - DEFAULT</p&gt <p&gt0x01 "Basic Set" received，key 1 responds; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; key 1 will send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association</p&gt <p&gt0x02 "Basic Set" received，all keys respond; "Basic Get" received，not reply "Basic Report"; All keys will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint） to LifeLine Association</p&gt <p&gt0x03 "Basic Set" received，all keys respond; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; All keys will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Scene respond
parameter.description: Scene respond<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</p&gt <p&gtBit0: =1 Key1 respond scene</p&gt <p&gt =0 Key1 not respond scene</p&gt <p&gtBit1: =1 Key2 respond scene</p&gt <p&gt =0 Key2 not respond scene</p&gt <p&gtBit7:4 Rev</p&gt</p&gt
